name: ccapdev-mc01-restaurant-review
description: MEMBERS: LIM, RYDEL  NGO, RENDELL KO, CARL

scripts.populate: mongoimport --db ccapdev --collection profiles --file ./populate/profiles.json --jsonArray && mongoimport --db ccapdev --collection restos --file ./populate/restos.json --jsonArray && mongoimport --db ccapdev --collection reviews --file ./populate/reviews.json --jsonArray
